casebody.data:
TEAGUE
v.
NCDOT et al. No. 281P06-6. Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 22, 2008. The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 18th day of July 2008 by Plaintiff for Temporary Stay: "Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 22nd day of July 2008." EDMUNDS, J., recused.
